{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R6230 |asin=B0756QFLXP |price=70 |fcc_date=10/07/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY314200274 |ic_id=4054A-14200274 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621ST |cpu1_cspeed=880 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G08AA-TI |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB64M16FP-DH |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7603EN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Smart WiFi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R6230.aspx}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R6230}} This R6230 is likely internally identical to the [[Netgear R6220]] since Netgear publishes a single firmware update for both models and no new FCC ID can be found for the R6230.
